attributes.action: stop child benefit being paid to children in Poland who have a parent working in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our tax burden is already heavy and ever-increasing.  We, the undersigned, believe it is a scandal that our hard-earned taxes are being sent to Poland as child benefit for children of Polish workers in this country.  We are already allowing Poles to work in this country, in some cases taking jobs from our own citizens.  Benefits for their offspring in Poland on top is taking things too far.  If necessary the UK needs to challenge seriously European Union rules on this.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Benefit-Sham/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
